"use strict";
Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule", { value: true });
const BaseViewExpand_1 = require("./BaseViewExpand");
const UICompConst_1 = require("../consts/UICompConst");
const csharp_1 = require("csharp");
const puerts_1 = require("puerts");
//按钮
class ButtonExpand extends BaseViewExpand_1.default {
    constructor(cobj) {
        super();
        this.uitype = UICompConst_1.default.comp_btn;
        if (cobj) {
            this.setCObject(cobj);
        }
    }
    //设置点击事件
    setClickFunc(func, thisObj, params) {
        this.clickFunc = func;
        this.clickObj = thisObj;
        this.backParams = params;
        var thisSelf = this;
        if (!this.__btnComp) {
            this.__btnComp = this.__cobject.GetComponent(puerts_1.$typeof(csharp_1.UnityEngine.UI.Button));
            if (!this.__btnComp) {
                LogsManager.errorTag("btnCompError", "这个没有按钮组件:" + this.name);
            }
            LogsManager.echo("__注册点击事件---");
            this.__btnComp.onClick.AddListener(() => {
                thisSelf.clickFunc.call(thisSelf.clickObj, thisSelf.backParams);
            });
        }
    }
}
exports.default = ButtonExpand;
